title: you should see me in a crown - Billie Eilish (Official Video By Takashi Murakami)

constellations_other.name: From Cute to Evil
constellations_other.description: In The Cute Machine, players are rewarded by making characters with the most juvenile or baby-ish features. Explore how broader screen works uphold or disrupt the idea that characters with cute traits are inherently good and those without are evil.

title_for_label: you should see me in a crown - Billie Eilish (Official Video By Takashi Murakami)
description: Directed and animated by artist Takashi Murakami, this official music video for Billie Eilish’s song ‘you should see me in a crown’ opens with an animated version of Eilish who eventually morphs into a giant spider and wreaks havoc on a city.
